function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Incomplete combustion due to excess air demand","Impact":"Increased emission of toxic pollutants and dioxins","Mitigation":"Optimize air supply and combustion parameters","Technologies":"Controlled air supply systems, automated combustion parameter monitoring","People":"Operators, environment","Owner":"Incinerator operators, environmental agencies"},{"Description":"High investment costs for small and medium scale equipment","Impact":"Low investment recovery rate and operational sustainability","Mitigation":"Careful financial planning and assessment of long-term benefits","Technologies":"Cost-effective materials, efficient design, optimized processes","People":"Investors, waste management organizations","Owner":"Investors, waste management organizations"},{"Description":"Complicated maintenance and high maintenance costs","Impact":"Disruption of waste disposal operations, increased downtime, and repair costs","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance schedules, use of reliable components, and proactive troubleshooting","Technologies":"Predictive maintenance systems, high-quality materials, remote monitoring","People":"Maintenance technicians, waste management organizations","Owner":"Maintenance technicians, waste management organizations"}]}
